Feature.Description: Commanding a Tecan Infinite M200 microplate reader integrated with Tecan Freedom EVO. Provides commands to measure the absorbance of 96 well plates with fixed parameters.

Command.Description: Triggers a Tecan EVOware script to operate the Infinite M200 reader for measuring the absorbance of a microplate with fixed parameres.

Response.Description: The absorbance values for the microplate in AnIML format.
Response.DataType:
String // ToDo: This could be binary or string
application/x-animl // ToDo: This may also change once spec is matured a bit

Property.Description: The name and location of the latest measurement results in AnIML format on the device file system.

StandardExecutionError.Description: The command cannot be issued as the server is not in the correct state.
